Our method; ST-GCN Dataset Example(PedalMeDatasetLoader)

import

import rpy2
import rpy2.robjects as ro 
from rpy2.robjects.vectors import FloatVector 
from rpy2.robjects.packages import importr

import torch
import numpy as np
from tqdm import tqdm

import torch.nn.functional as F
from torch_geometric_temporal.nn.recurrent import GConvGRU

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

import time

from scipy.interpolate import interp1d

import tensorflow as tf
class RecurrentGCN(torch.nn.Module):
    def __init__(self, node_features, filters):
        super(RecurrentGCN, self).__init__()
        self.recurrent = GConvGRU(node_features, filters, 2)
        self.linear = torch.nn.Linear(filters, 1)

    def forward(self, x, edge_index, edge_weight):
        h = self.recurrent(x, edge_index, edge_weight)
        h = F.relu(h)
        h = self.linear(h)
        return h

R

%load_ext rpy2.ipython

시간측정 방법

t1= time.time()
for epoc in range(1000):
    ## 1 
    yhat = net(x) 
    ## 2 
    loss = loss_fn(yhat,y)
    ## 3 
    loss.backward()
    ## 4 
    optimizr.step()
    optimizr.zero_grad()
t2 = time.time()
t2-t1

EbayesThresh

%%R
library(EbayesThresh)
set.seed(1)
epsilon = rnorm(1000)
signal = sample(c(runif(25,-2,-1.5), runif(25,1.5,2), rep(0,950)))
index_of_trueoutlier = which(signal!=0)
x_ebayes=signal+epsilon
%R -o x_ebayes
%R -o index_of_trueoutlier
%R -o signal
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
outlier_true_index = index_of_trueoutlier
outlier_true_value = x_ebayes[index_of_trueoutlier]
outlier_true_one = signal.copy()
outlier_true_one = list(map(lambda x: -1 if x!=0 else 1,outlier_true_one))

0. 데이터 가정

데이터가정: missing (결측값) 이 있는 자료를 가정

  • missing이 있는상태: ST-GCN 을 사용할 수 X \(\to\) 코드에 에러는 나지 않지만 yhat이 산출되지 않았습니다.
  • missing이 없어야만: ST-GCN 을 사용할 수 O

ST-GCN Example Data

증명 - missing이 있는상태: ST-GCN 을 사용할 수 X

from torch_geometric_temporal.dataset import PedalMeDatasetLoader
from torch_geometric_temporal.signal import temporal_signal_split
loader = PedalMeDatasetLoader()
dataset = loader.get_dataset(lags=1)
train_dataset, _ = temporal_signal_split(dataset, train_ratio=1)

데이터 일부 missing 처리

data=[]
for time, snapshot in enumerate(train_dataset):
    data.append([time,snapshot])
data[0][1].x.shape,data[0][1].y.shape,data[0][1].edge_index.shape,data[0][1].edge_attr.shape
(torch.Size([15, 1]),
 torch.Size([15]),
 torch.Size([2, 225]),
 torch.Size([225]))
time
33
T = time
N = len(data[0][1].x)
edge_index = data[0][1].edge_index
edge_attr = data[0][1].edge_attr
x = []
for i in range(time):
    x.append(data[i][1].x)
data_tensor = torch.Tensor()
# Iterate over the data points of the dataset
for i in x:
    # Concatenate the data point to the tensor
    data_tensor = torch.cat((data_tensor, i), dim=0)
x = data_tensor.reshape(time,N,-1)
x.shape
torch.Size([33, 15, 1])
y = []
for i in range(time):
    y.append(data[i][1].y)
data_tensor = torch.Tensor()
# Iterate over the data points of the dataset
for i in y:
    # Concatenate the data point to the tensor
    data_tensor = torch.cat((data_tensor, i), dim=0)
y = data_tensor.reshape(time,N)
y.shape
torch.Size([33, 15])

1) Block

xblock = x.clone()
xblock[5][5:10] = float('nan')
plt.plot(xblock[5])

f = xblock
X = f[:T-1,:,:]
y = f[1:,:,:]
model = RecurrentGCN(node_features=1, filters=4)

optimizer = torch.optim.Adam(model.parameters(), lr=0.01)
for epoch in tqdm(range(50)):
    for time, (xt,yt) in enumerate(zip(X,y)):
        y_hat = model(xt, edge_index, edge_attr)
        cost = torch.mean((y_hat-yt)**2)
        cost.backward()
        optimizer.step()
        optimizer.zero_grad()
100%|██████████| 50/50 [00:05<00:00,  8.43it/s]
yhat = torch.stack([model(xt, edge_index, edge_attr) for xt in X]).detach().numpy()
plt.plot(yhat[1].data)
plt.plot(yhat[2].data)

2) Random missing values

xrandom = x.clone()
np.random.seed(1)
seed_number = np.random.choice(len(xrandom[0]), 5, replace=False)
xrandom[5][seed_number] = float('nan')
plt.plot(xrandom[5],'o')

3) By 2

xtwo = x.clone()
two_number = np.arange(1, N, 2)
xtwo[5][two_number] = float('nan')
plt.plot(xtwo[5],'o')

1. missing을 채움. (mean, linear interpolation)

1.1. Mean

1) Block

xblock_mean = xblock.clone()
xblock_mean[5][5:10] = np.mean(xblock_mean[5][:4].tolist()+xblock_mean[5][10:].tolist())
plt.plot(xblock_mean[5])

2) Random missing values

xrandom_mean = xrandom.clone()
df = pd.DataFrame(xrandom_mean[5].tolist())
mean_value = df.mean() # finds the mean value of the column A
df = df.fillna(mean_value) # replace missing values with the mean value
xrandom_mean[5] = torch.Tensor(df.values)
plt.plot(xrandom_mean[5])

3) By 2

xtwo_mean = xtwo.clone()
df = pd.DataFrame(xtwo_mean[5].tolist())
mean_value = df.mean() # finds the mean value of the column A
df = df.fillna(mean_value) # replace missing values with the mean value
xtwo_mean[5] = torch.Tensor(df.values)
plt.plot(xtwo_mean[5])

1.2. linear interpolation

1) Block

xblock_linearinterpolation = xblock.clone()
# Sample data points
x = np.array([4,10])
y = np.array([xblock_linearinterpolation[5][4],xblock_linearinterpolation[5][10]])

# Create interpolating function
f = interp1d(x, y, kind='linear')

# Estimate y value for x = 2.5
y_interp = f(range(5,10))
/tmp/ipykernel_2897385/283446624.py:3: FutureWarning: The input object of type 'Tensor' is an array-like implementing one of the corresponding protocols (`__array__`, `__array_interface__` or `__array_struct__`); but not a sequence (or 0-D). In the future, this object will be coerced as if it was first converted using `np.array(obj)`. To retain the old behaviour, you have to either modify the type 'Tensor', or assign to an empty array created with `np.empty(correct_shape, dtype=object)`.
  y = np.array([xblock_linearinterpolation[5][4],xblock_linearinterpolation[5][10]])
/tmp/ipykernel_2897385/283446624.py:3: VisibleDeprecationWarning: Creating an ndarray from ragged nested sequences (which is a list-or-tuple of lists-or-tuples-or ndarrays with different lengths or shapes) is deprecated. If you meant to do this, you must specify 'dtype=object' when creating the ndarray.
  y = np.array([xblock_linearinterpolation[5][4],xblock_linearinterpolation[5][10]])
xblock_linearinterpolation[5][5:10] = torch.Tensor(y_interp).reshape(5,1)
plt.plot(xblock_linearinterpolation[5])

2) Random missing values

xrandom_linearinterpolation = xrandom.clone()
df = pd.DataFrame(xrandom_linearinterpolation[5].tolist())
df.interpolate(method='linear', inplace=True)
df = df.fillna(0)
xrandom_linearinterpolation[5] = torch.Tensor(df.values)
plt.plot(xrandom_linearinterpolation[5])

3) By 2

xtwo_linearinterpolation = xtwo.clone()
df = pd.DataFrame(xtwo_linearinterpolation[5].tolist())
df.interpolate(method='linear', inplace=True)
df = df.fillna(0)
xtwo_linearinterpolation[5] = torch.Tensor(df.values)
plt.plot(xtwo_linearinterpolation[5])

1.3. Normal distribution Random Values

1) Block

xblock_normal = xblock.clone()
xblock_normal[5][5:10] = torch.tensor(np.random.normal(loc=0,scale=0.2,size=5)).reshape(5,1)
plt.plot(xblock_normal[5])

2) Random missing values

xrandom_normal = xrandom.clone()
xrandom_normal[5][seed_number] = torch.tensor(np.random.normal(loc=0,scale=0.2,size=5),dtype=torch.float32).reshape(5,1)
plt.plot(xrandom_normal[5])

3) By 2

xtwo_normal = xtwo.clone()
xtwo_normal[5][two_number] = torch.tensor(np.random.normal(loc=0,scale=0.2,size=7),dtype=torch.float32).reshape(7,1)
plt.plot(xtwo_normal[5])

2. ST-GCN 을 사용하여 fhat을 구함. (스무딩1)

2.1. Mean

1) Block

f_xblock_mean = xblock_mean.clone()
X_f_xblock_mean = f_xblock_mean[:T-1,:,:]
y_f_xblock_mean = f_xblock_mean[1:,:,:]
model = RecurrentGCN(node_features=1, filters=4)

optimizer = torch.optim.Adam(model.parameters(), lr=0.01)

model.train()

for epoch in tqdm(range(50)):
    for time, (xt,yt) in enumerate(zip(X_f_xblock_mean,y_f_xblock_mean)):
        y_hat = model(xt, edge_index, edge_attr)
        cost = torch.mean((y_hat-yt)**2)
        cost.backward()
        optimizer.step()
        optimizer.zero_grad()
100%|██████████| 50/50 [00:05<00:00,  8.57it/s]
fhat_xblock_mean = torch.stack([model(xt, edge_index, edge_attr) for xt in X_f_xblock_mean]).detach().numpy()
plt.plot(fhat_xblock_mean[5].data)

2) Random missing values

f_xrandom_mean = xrandom_mean.clone()
X_f_xrandom_mean = f_xrandom_mean[:T-1,:,:]
y_f_xrandom_mean = f_xrandom_mean[1:,:,:]
model = RecurrentGCN(node_features=1, filters=4)

optimizer = torch.optim.Adam(model.parameters(), lr=0.01)

model.train()

for epoch in tqdm(range(50)):
    for time, (xt,yt) in enumerate(zip(X_f_xrandom_mean,y_f_xrandom_mean)):
        y_hat = model(xt, edge_index, edge_attr)
        cost = torch.mean((y_hat-yt)**2)
        cost.backward()
        optimizer.step()
        optimizer.zero_grad()
100%|██████████| 50/50 [00:05<00:00,  8.54it/s]
fhat_xrandom_mean = torch.stack([model(xt, edge_index, edge_attr) for xt in X_f_xrandom_mean]).detach().numpy()
plt.plot(fhat_xrandom_mean[5].data)

3. 2에서 얻은 fhat을 이용하여 그래프퓨리에변환+Ebayesthresh (스무딩2)

  • 그래프퓨리에변환을 하는 가중치
  • 년도끼리 이어주어서 하나의 큰 그래프로 만든뒤에 GFT
  • Ebayesthresh

3.1. Mean

3.1.1. Temporal

1) Block

w=np.zeros((N,T-1,T-1))
for k in range(N):
    for i in range(T-1):
        for j in range(T-1):
            if i==j :
                w[k,i,j] = 0
            elif np.abs(i-j) <= 1 : 
                w[k,i,j] = 1
d = np.array([w[i].sum(axis=1) for i in range(N)])
D= np.array([np.diag(d[i]) for i in range(N)])
L = np.array([np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) @ (D[i]-w[i]) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) for i in range(N)])
lamb, Psi  = np.linalg.eigh(L)[0],np.linalg.eigh(L)[1]
Lamb = np.array([np.diag(lamb[i]) for i in range(N)])    
fhatbar = np.hstack([Psi[i] @ fhat_xblock_mean[:,i] for i in range(N)])
_fhatbar = fhatbar.reshape(N,T-1)
power = _fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(_fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,_fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = np.array([Psi[i] @ fhatbar_threshed[i] for i in range(N)])    
fhatbarhat_block_mean_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_block_mean_temporal[5])

2) Random missing values

ND= np.array([np.diag(d[i]) for i in range(N)])
L = np.array([np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) @ (D[i]-w[i]) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) for i in range(N)])
lamb, Psi  = np.linalg.eigh(L)[0],np.linalg.eigh(L)[1]
Lamb = np.array([np.diag(lamb[i]) for i in range(N)])    
fhatbar = np.hstack([Psi[i] @ fhat_xrandom_mean[:,i] for i in range(N)])
_fhatbar = fhatbar.reshape(N,T-1)
power = _fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(_fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,_fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = np.array([Psi[i] @ fhatbar_threshed[i] for i in range(N)])    
fhatbarhat_random_mean_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_random_mean_temporal[5])

3) By 2

d = np.array([w[i].sum(axis=1) for i in range(N)])
D= np.array([np.diag(d[i]) for i in range(N)])
L = np.array([np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) @ (D[i]-w[i]) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) for i in range(N)])
lamb, Psi  = np.linalg.eigh(L)[0],np.linalg.eigh(L)[1]
Lamb = np.array([np.diag(lamb[i]) for i in range(N)])    
fhatbar = np.hstack([Psi[i] @ fhat_xtwo_mean[:,i] for i in range(N)])
_fhatbar = fhatbar.reshape(N,T-1)
power = _fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(_fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,_fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = np.array([Psi[i] @ fhatbar_threshed[i] for i in range(N)])    
fhatbarhat_two_mean_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_two_mean_temporal[5])

3.1.2. Spatio

1) Block

w=np.zeros((N,N))
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(N):
        if i==j :
            w[i,j] = 0
        elif np.abs(i-j) <= 1 : 
            w[i,j] = 1
d = np.array(w.sum(axis=1))
D = np.diag(d)
L = np.array(np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)) @ (D-w) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)))
lamb, Psi = np.linalg.eigh(L)
Lamb = np.diag(lamb)
fhatbar = Psi @ fhat_xblock_mean.reshape(N,T-1)
power = fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = Psi @ fhatbar_threshed
fhatbarhat_xblock_mean_spatio = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_xblock_mean_spatio[5])

2) Random missing values

d = np.array(w.sum(axis=1))
D = np.diag(d)
L = np.array(np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)) @ (D-w) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)))
lamb, Psi = np.linalg.eigh(L)
Lamb = np.diag(lamb)
fhatbar = Psi @ fhat_xrandom_mean.reshape(N,T-1)
power = fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = Psi @ fhatbar_threshed
fhatbarhat_xrandom_mean_spatio = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_xrandom_mean_spatio[5])

3) By 2

d = np.array(w.sum(axis=1))
D = np.diag(d)
L = np.array(np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)) @ (D-w) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)))
lamb, Psi = np.linalg.eigh(L)
Lamb = np.diag(lamb)
fhatbar = Psi @ fhat_xtwo_mean.reshape(N,T-1)
power = fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = Psi @ fhatbar_threshed
fhatbarhat_xtwo_mean_spatio = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_xtwo_mean_spatio[5])

3.1.3. Spatio-Temporal

1) Block

w=np.zeros((480,480))
for i in range(480):
    for j in range(480):
        if i==j :
            w[i,j] = 0
        elif np.abs(i-j) <= 1 : 
            w[i,j] = 1
d = np.array(w.sum(axis=1))
D = np.diag(d)
L = np.array(np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)) @ (D-w) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)))
lamb, Psi = np.linalg.eigh(L)
Lamb = np.diag(lamb)
fhatbar = Psi @ fhat_xblock_mean.reshape(480,1)
power = fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(480)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = Psi @ fhatbar_threshed
fhatbarhat_block_mean_spatio_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,N,1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_block_mean_spatio_temporal[5])

L = np.array(np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)) @ (D-w) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)))
lamb, Psi = np.linalg.eigh(L)
Lamb = np.diag(lamb)
fhatbar = Psi @ fhat_xrandom_mean.reshape(480,1)
power = fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(480)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = Psi @ fhatbar_threshed

3.2.linear interpolation

3.2.1. Temporal

1) Block

w=np.zeros((N,T-1,T-1))
for k in range(N):
    for i in range(T-1):
        for j in range(T-1):
            if i==j :
                w[k,i,j] = 0
            elif np.abs(i-j) <= 1 : 
                w[k,i,j] = 1
d = np.array([w[i].sum(axis=1) for i in range(N)])
D= np.array([np.diag(d[i]) for i in range(N)])
L = np.array([np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) @ (D[i]-w[i]) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) for i in range(N)])
lamb, Psi  = np.linalg.eigh(L)[0],np.linalg.eigh(L)[1]
Lamb = np.array([np.diag(lamb[i]) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar = np.hstack([Psi[i] @ fhat_linearinterpolation[:,i] for i in range(N)])
_fhatbar = fhatbar.reshape(N,T-1)
power = _fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(_fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])    
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,_fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = np.array([Psi[i] @ fhatbar_threshed[i] for i in range(N)])    
fhatbarhat_block_linearinterpolation_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_block_linearinterpolation_temporal[5])

2) Random missing values

d = np.array([w[i].sum(axis=1) for i in range(N)])
D= np.array([np.diag(d[i]) for i in range(N)])
L = np.array([np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) @ (D[i]-w[i]) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) for i in range(N)])
lamb, Psi  = np.linalg.eigh(L)[0],np.linalg.eigh(L)[1]
Lamb = np.array([np.diag(lamb[i]) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar = np.hstack([Psi[i] @ fhat_random_linearinterpolation[:,i] for i in range(N)])
_fhatbar = fhatbar.reshape(N,T-1)
power = _fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(_fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])    
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,_fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = np.array([Psi[i] @ fhatbar_threshed[i] for i in range(N)])    
fhatbarhat_random_linearinterpolation_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_random_linearinterpolation_temporal[5])

3) By 2

d = np.array([w[i].sum(axis=1) for i in range(N)])
D= np.array([np.diag(d[i]) for i in range(N)])
L = np.array([np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) @ (D[i]-w[i]) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) for i in range(N)])
lamb, Psi  = np.linalg.eigh(L)[0],np.linalg.eigh(L)[1]
Lamb = np.array([np.diag(lamb[i]) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar = np.hstack([Psi[i] @ fhat_two_linearinterpolation[:,i] for i in range(N)])
_fhatbar = fhatbar.reshape(N,T-1)
power = _fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(_fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])    
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,_fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = np.array([Psi[i] @ fhatbar_threshed[i] for i in range(N)])    
fhatbarhat_two_linearinterpolation_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_two_linearinterpolation_temporal[5])

3.2.2. Spatio

1) Block

w=np.zeros((N,N))
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(N):
        if i==j :
            w[i,j] = 0
        elif np.abs(i-j) <= 1 : 
            w[i,j] = 1
d = np.array(w.sum(axis=1))
D = np.diag(d)
L = np.array(np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)) @ (D-w) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)))
lamb, Psi = np.linalg.eigh(L)
Lamb = np.diag(lamb)
fhatbar = Psi @ fhat_linearinterpolation.reshape(N,T-1)
power = fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])    
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = Psi @ fhatbar_threshed

plt.plot(fhatbarhat_block_linearinterpolation_spatio[5])

3.3. Normal distribution

3.3.1. Temporal

1) Block

w=np.zeros((N,T-1,T-1))
for k in range(N):
    for i in range(T-1):
        for j in range(T-1):
            if i==j :
                w[k,i,j] = 0
            elif np.abs(i-j) <= 1 : 
                w[k,i,j] = 1
d = np.array([w[i].sum(axis=1) for i in range(N)])
D= np.array([np.diag(d[i]) for i in range(N)])
L = np.array([np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) @ (D[i]-w[i]) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) for i in range(N)])
lamb, Psi  = np.linalg.eigh(L)[0],np.linalg.eigh(L)[1]
Lamb = np.array([np.diag(lamb[i]) for i in range(N)])    
fhatbar = np.hstack([Psi[i] @ fhat_xblock_normal[:,i] for i in range(N)])
_fhatbar = fhatbar.reshape(N,T-1)
power = _fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(_fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,_fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = np.array([Psi[i] @ fhatbar_threshed[i] for i in range(N)])    
fhatbarhat_block_normal_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_block_normal_temporal[5])

2) Random missing values

d = np.array([w[i].sum(axis=1) for i in range(N)])
D= np.array([np.diag(d[i]) for i in range(N)])
L = np.array([np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) @ (D[i]-w[i]) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) for i in range(N)])
lamb, Psi  = np.linalg.eigh(L)[0],np.linalg.eigh(L)[1]
Lamb = np.array([np.diag(lamb[i]) for i in range(N)])    
fhatbar = np.hstack([Psi[i] @ fhat_xrandom_normal[:,i] for i in range(N)])
_fhatbar = fhatbar.reshape(N,T-1)
power = _fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(_fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(N)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,_fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = np.array([Psi[i] @ fhatbar_threshed[i] for i in range(N)])    
fhatbarhat_random_normal_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,-1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_block_normal_temporal[5])

3) By 2

d = np.array([w[i].sum(axis=1) for i in range(N)])
D= np.array([np.diag(d[i]) for i in range(N)])
L = np.array([np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) @ (D[i]-w[i]) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d[i])) for i in range(N)])

3.3.3. Spatio-Temporal

1) Block

w=np.zeros((480,480))
for i in range(480):
    for j in range(480):
        if i==j :
            w[i,j] = 0
        elif np.abs(i-j) <= 1 : 
            w[i,j] = 1
d = np.array(w.sum(axis=1))
D = np.diag(d)
L = np.array(np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)) @ (D-w) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)))
lamb, Psi = np.linalg.eigh(L)
Lamb = np.diag(lamb)
fhatbar = Psi @ fhat_xblock_normal.reshape(480,1)
power = fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(480)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = Psi @ fhatbar_threshed
fhatbarhat_block_normal_spatio_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,N,1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_block_normal_spatio_temporal[5])

2) Random missing values

d = np.array(w.sum(axis=1))
D = np.diag(d)
L = np.array(np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)) @ (D-w) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)))
lamb, Psi = np.linalg.eigh(L)
Lamb = np.diag(lamb)
fhatbar = Psi @ fhat_xrandom_normal.reshape(480,1)
power = fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(480)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = Psi @ fhatbar_threshed
fhatbarhat_random_normal_spatio_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,N,1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_random_normal_spatio_temporal[5])

3) By 2

d = np.array(w.sum(axis=1))
D = np.diag(d)
L = np.array(np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)) @ (D-w) @ np.diag(1/np.sqrt(d)))
lamb, Psi = np.linalg.eigh(L)
Lamb = np.diag(lamb)
fhatbar = Psi @ fhat_xtwo_normal.reshape(480,1)
power = fhatbar**2 
ebayesthresh = importr('EbayesThresh').ebayesthresh
power_threshed=np.array([np.array(ebayesthresh(FloatVector(fhatbar[i]**2))) for i in range(480)])
fhatbar_threshed = np.where(power_threshed>0,fhatbar,0)
fhatbarhat = Psi @ fhatbar_threshed
fhatbarhat_two_normal_spatio_temporal = fhatbarhat.reshape(T-1,N,1)
plt.plot(fhatbarhat_two_normal_spatio_temporal[5])

4. 1로 돌아가서 반복
